(29392, 32572).name: paleo-magnetism

(29392, 32572).name: volcanic activity

(29392, 32572).label: weather event

(29392, 32572).label: platform
(29392, 32572).description: A collection of natural or human-made records that provide information about past climates, environments, and ecosystems

(29392, 32572).description: A region of frozen soil and rock that stores significant amounts of carbon and can provide insights into past climates and ecosystems

(29392, 32572).label: instrument

(29392, 32572).name: community-scale genome sequencing
(29392, 32572).label: instrument

(32067, 35443).name: paleo-magnetism
(32067, 35443).label: instrument
(32067, 35443).description: A technique used to measure the orientation of magnetic minerals in rocks and sediments, providing information on past magnetic fields and climate conditions

(32067, 35443).label: instrument

(32067, 35443).name: tephra layers

(32067, 35443).name: volcanic activity
(32067, 35443).label: natural hazard
(32067, 35443).description: The process of eruption and release of volcanic materials, such as ash, lava, and gas, which can impact climate and the environment

(32067, 35443).name: ice

(32067, 35443).name: earth-systems models
(32067, 35443).label: model
(32067, 35443).description: Sophisticated computer simulations that integrate physical, chemical, and biological processes to represent and predict the Earth's climate system

(32067, 35443).name: solar variability

(32067, 35443).description: The complete set of genetic information contained within an organism's DNA, which can be used to study the evolution, diversity, and adaptation of organisms
